sn55.10:4.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.10:4.4: Kaḷibho nāma, bhante, ñātike upāsako … pe …
sn55.10:4.10: subhaddo nāma, bhante, ñātike upāsako kālaṅkato;
sn55.10:5.1: “Kakkaṭo, ānanda, upāsako kālaṅkato pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
sn55.10:5.8: subhaddo, ānanda, upāsako kālaṅkato pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
sn55.10:6.1: Paropaññāsa, ānanda, ñātike upāsakā kālaṅkatā pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā.
sn55.10:6.2: Sādhikanavuti, ānanda, ñātike upāsakā kālaṅkatā tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmino;
sn55.10:6.3: sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti.
sn55.10:6.4: Chātirekāni kho, ānanda, pañcasatāni ñātike upāsakā kālaṅkatā tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā.
sn55.10:7.1: Anacchariyaṃ kho panetaṃ, ānanda, yaṃ manussabhūto kālaṃ kareyya;
sn55.10:7.2: tasmiṃ tasmiñce maṃ kālaṅkate upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipucchissatha.
sn55.10:7.5: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn55.10:7.6: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’.
sn55.10:8.1: Katamo ca so, ānanda, dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo;
sn55.10:8.2: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn55.10:8.3: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’.
sn55.10:9.1: Idhānanda, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.10:9.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.10:9.8: Ayaṃ kho so, ānanda, dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo;
sn55.10:9.9: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn55.10:9.10: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’”ti.
